official_title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to provide increased penalties for illegal distributions of controlled substances in or adjacent to elementary and secondary schools.

summary.text: Amends the Controlled Substances Act to specify increased penalties, including minimum mandatory prison terms, for illegal distribution of controlled substances in or adjacent to elementary or secondary schools.
